extracted-table.table-wrap-foot: Abbreviations: DLPFC, dorsolateral prefrontal cortex; DMPFC, dorsomedial prefrontal cortex; PCC, posterior cingulate cortex.aThe p‐value survived small volume correction (SVC) within a sphere of 5‐mm radius in the right DLPFC centered at MNI coordinates: [24, 45, 18] (DiNuzzo et al., 2019).
